message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you, but I'm open to discussing the price further.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be able to meet me halfway?
I appreciate you countering, Bob. While I value your interest, $10,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I still feel that $10,000 would be a fair compromise. Could we meet at $10,500?
